description: A zombie resurrected by the adepti, Qiqi is a Cryo sword user from Liyue who excels at healing and Cryo application.
info: Qiqi is a Cryo healer who excels at sustained healing and Cryo application. Build her for ATK%, Healing Bonus, and Energy Recharge.

skills.name: Normal Attack: Ancient Sword Art
skills.desc: Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
skills.details_html:
Normal Attack
Performs up to 5 rapid strikes with a sword.
Charged Attack
Consumes stamina to unleash two rapid sword strikes.
Plunging Attack
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
skills.desc: Qiqi summons the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG and healing the active character on hit. Healing scales with Qiqi's ATK.
skills.details_html:
Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost
Summons the Herald of Frost, dealing Cryo DMG and healing the active character on hit. Healing scales with Qiqi's ATK.

skills.name: Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
skills.desc: Qiqi marks nearby enemies with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, dealing Cryo DMG. When enemies marked are hit, the active character is healed.
skills.details_html:
Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune
Marks enemies with a Fortune-Preserving Talisman, dealing Cryo DMG. When marked enemies are hit, the active character is healed.

passive_talents.name: Life-Prolonging Methods
passive_talents.desc: When a character under the effect of a Fortune-Preserving Talisman triggers an Elemental Reaction, their Healing Bonus is increased by 20% for 8s.

passive_talents.name: A Glimpse into Arcanum
passive_talents.desc: Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attacks regenerate 2 Energy for her when they hit enemies affected by Cryo. Can only occur once every 5s.

passive_talents.name: Former Life Memories
passive_talents.desc: Displays the location of nearby resources unique to Liyue on the mini-map.

constellations.name: Ascetics of Frost
constellations.desc: When the Herald of Frost hits enemies marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman, Qiqi regenerates 2 Energy.

constellations.name: Frozen to the Bone
constellations.desc: Qiqi's Normal and Charged Attack DMG against enemies affected by Cryo is increased by 15%.

constellations.name: Ascendant Praise
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Divine Suppression
constellations.desc: Targets marked by the Fortune-Preserving Talisman have their ATK decreased by 20%.

constellations.name: Crimson Lotus Bloom
constellations.desc: Increases the level of Adeptus Art: Herald of Frost by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.

constellations.name: Rite of Resurrection
constellations.desc: Using Adeptus Art: Preserver of Fortune revives all fallen party members nearby and regenerates 50% of their HP. Can only occur once every 15 minutes.
